reviews.review: Good game men for mange ruski

This isn't a game for those who think they are going to be good right off the back. You WILL more than likely encounter a hacker, but its up to you if you're willing to deal with that or not...Even though there are still hackers, its also evident they are working everyday to improve this. 
All in all, you'll get mad at the game, but you'll also get better! Good game play it love it be it!
Really fun game love the steep learning curve and the amazing community that comes with it. 10/10 - IGN Approved
Um jogo bem competitivo, bom para jogar com amigos
Игры для лсных хуесосов без личной жизни

I dont recommend buying this game if you dont like toxic people. The community is probably the worst community you will ever find on Steam. Too many hackers and people smurfing, but it's actually a really addictive game and in my opinion its really fun playing competitive when you there is a full team that actually communicates with you and not fooling around being a complete ahole or influencing the teammates gameplay by being toxic and negative all the time.
I recommend getting the game if you have a atrong personality and actually play with a headset. (Lmao)
Overall, great game and very fun if you dedicate your soul into this game. 6/10

- zu profitorientierte Updates, die nicht auf Contentzwachs aus sind.
Excelente, abandonei o CS 1.6 recentemente, uma grande evolução, principalmente nos efeitos sonoros, e nos recuos das armas.

I do love this game but the problem is that if you have other things to do besides this game than don't buy it. I got a week ban because I had to eat dinner. Also the game makes it realy easy to hack and it can cause a huge amout of problems.
